attr.title: Spinch
attr.desc: Transcend the material realm and assume your true form as Spinch, a hyper-agile organism consumed by the quest to rescue a litter of its missing offspring, in this side-scrolling, psychedelic platformer from the mind of award-winning Canadian cartoonist, Jesse Jacobs.
attr.desc_md:
Transcend the material realm and assume your true form as Spinch, a hyper-agile organism consumed by the quest to rescue a litter of its missing offspring, in this side-scrolling, psychedelic platformer from the mind of award-winning Canadian cartoonist, Jesse Jacobs.

**Note: Patching time is at least 30 minutes!**
attr.inst:
Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/794240/Spinch/ (also available but not tested from gog and humble).  
Copy all the game files to /ports/spinch/assets
